attributes.additional_details:
Andrew Lansley and the Department of Health (DoH) want doctors to pay 14.5% of their income into their pensions funds.  This is despite the fact that Andrew Lansley and those at the DoH do not pay anything like this much into their pensions.

This petition proposes that all politicians and civil servants should also pay the same rate of contribution as doctors, unless the government decides that the increased rate for doctors is grossly unfair and is scrapped.
